{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04297v1", "title": "Investigating monogenity in a family of cyclic sextic fields", "summary": "L. Jones characterized among others monogenity of a family of cyclic sextic
polynomials. Our purpose is to study monogenity of the family of corresponding
sextic number fields. This also provides the first non-trivial application of
the used method, emphasizing its efficiency.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-05-07T10:08:35Z"}
